a creature few knew of, and fewer
had seen. Not because it's a hoax,
but because it's elusive!

2EXT. SQUATCH HALL/FOREST- STOMPED PATH- EVENING
PATTERSON GIMLIN, 85, stands at a PODIUM ON A STAGE, AS HIS
FILM PLAYS BEHIND HIM ON A PROJECTOR SCREEN.
He wears a FLUFFY BROWN ROBE, and has a WOODEN CANE TIPPED
WITH A BRASS SQUATCH FOOT.
The stage is BEHIND SQUATCH HALL, near the THICK FOREST.

Gimlin smiles, as his subjects 'cheer' for him.
SEVERAL BANNERS READ, "HAPPY BIGFOOT DAY 2007!"
MAX RHEED, 7, a short, skinny, blonde boy, happily stomps
along. His mother, SARAH, 35, participates as well.
SOON, MAX IS SWOOPED UP BY A ROARING MAN- JACK RHEED, 35.

REVEALING A HUMAN HEAD- HAIR, SKIN AND ALL.
Their face isn't visible, and they immediately put the mask

MAX STANDS IN HORROR as the Hoaxer reapplies their mask.
BIGFOOT IS A HOAX!!!
He watches as 'Bigfoot' takes Jack deeper into the forest.
After a beat, Max comes to his senses and resumes the chase,
before TRIPPING. He looks- 'BIGFOOT' AND JACK ARE BOTH GONE!

4INT. RHEED-ORR HOME- BOYS' BEDROOM- MORNING
A CLOSEUP ON MAX'S FACE. He's older now, 17. Pimply and
awkward, with messy hair and wide eyes. He has his same
expression from 10 years ago- one of ANGER AND EMPTINESS.
On the wall beside him, is a slightly-ripped newspaper
clipping dated October 20, 2007, reading:
"LOCAL MAN JACK RHEED GOES MISSING AT THE STOMPED PATH
CELEBRATION! BIGFOOT TO BLAME? (AGAIN?)"
Various photos show Young Max, Jack and Sarah together. Other
clippings show CLUES MAX HAS COLLECTED ABOUT THE SASQUATCH
AND GIMLINSTOWN'S MANY DISSAPPEARANCES.
On the other side of the room, ELLIOT ORR, a cleaner-cut,
better put-together kid the same age as Max, perfects his
HALL MONITOR ATTIRE in a mirror, and combs his dark hair.
The sides of the room couldn't be more different. Max's is
bare and messy, clothes everywhere. Elliot's, however, is
neat, and completely decked out with Bigfoot decorations.
On Elliot's dresser is a series of photos showing an older
Sarah marrying CALEB ORR, who's dressed in a STOMPED-AWAY
SQUATCH EXTERMINATION UNIFORM even at his own wedding.
(MORE)
4CONTINUED:11.
This photo is dated February 14, 2017- "Caleb Orr and Sarah
Rheed, 2-14-17". There's also a "Most Squatch Sightings 2015"
trophy, as well as several consecutive years worth of "Hall
Monitor of the Year" awards, from 2010-2016.
Other photos there show that Max and Elliot- stepbrothers-
don't like each other- and that Elliot loves Bigfoot, while
Max is totally averse to it. In one, they fight physically.
Elliot sees Max laying motionless in the mirror. He smiles
snidely, and speaks at him while fixing his hair.
ELLIOT

THE TITLE CARD SMASHES ON-SCREEN, BETWEEN THE ROOM'S SIDES:

5INT. GIMLINSTOWN POLICE STATION- EVIDENCE ROOM- DAY
Max rifles through a file cabinet drawer, sifting his fingers
through several MISSING PERSON'S FILES. THEY ALL MENTION
BIGFOOT, ATTRIBUTING THE SASQUATCH AS THE "PERPETRATOR".
Max GRABS ALL OF THE FILES, and kneels down, trying to shove
them all into his backpack. They won't fit. He just manages
to zip up the bag, which is now EXTREMELY BULKY.
Satisfied, Max stands up, slinging the pack over his
shoulder, about to leave- AND IS FACED WITH A COP.
MAX

The cop holds up HANDCUFFS; any press not under Gimlin's
thumb is frowned on, and Max isn't even a reporter. Max
sighs, gripping his Bigfoot plush, having no way out.
